action.query: When was the last US penny minted?
When was the last US penny minted? date
"last US penny minted" date OR year

content.text:
**2025-11-12**[[1]](https://www.usmint.gov/news/press-releases/united-states-mint-hosts-historic-ceremonial-strike-for-final-production-of-the-circulating-one-cent-coin)[[2]](https://www.usmint.gov/news/press-releases/united-states-mint-hosts-historic-ceremonial-strike-for-final-production-of-the-circulating-one-cent-coin?srsltid=AfmBOoo_2y6ij5beyE-nbBsGAHOrBuwFtpPyLFe5DINC2FAU4DeT0G4a)

Multiple reliable sources, including the official U.S. Mint press release [web:10] and [web:0], confirm that the final circulating one-cent coin (penny) was struck on November 12, 2025, at the Philadelphia Mint during a ceremonial event led by U.S. Treasurer Brandon Beach. This marked the end of 232 years of penny production for circulation, as announced earlier in 2025 due to high production costs exceeding the coin's value.[[3]](https://www.cnn.com/2025/11/12/business/last-penny-minted)[[4]](https://www.businessinsider.com/last-penny-history-photos-2025-11)

tools.description:
Execute a bash command inside the sandbox and return the output.
The working directory is the project root.
tools.name: bash

tools.description: Perform a search-and-replace edit on a file.
tools.name: edit

file_path.description: The path to the file to modify (relative to repo root)

old_string.description: The text to replace (must appear exactly once in the file)

tools.description: Write content to a new file. Returns an error if the file already exists.
tools.name: write

file_path.description: The path to the file to create (relative to repo root)

content.description: The content to write to the file
